title: Loyalty Challenge Task Completion

xdm:quantity.title: Quantity
xdm:quantity.description: Total quantity accumulated for this task completion.

xdm:spend.title: Spend
xdm:spend.description: Total spend accumulated for this task completion.

xdm:days.title: days
xdm:days.description: Number of qualified days accumulated for this task completion.

xdm:qualifiedEvents.description: List of events that provided progress toward task completion.

xdm:transactionId.title: Transaction ID
